title: Implement NATS Queue
description: Implement Publisher and Consumer interfaces in internal/queue/nats.go. Use JetStream for durability. Wire in cmd/server/main.go. Config already exists in cfg.Queue.

title: Implement Podman + CRIU Runtime
description: Implement Runtime interface in internal/container/podman.go. Methods: RestoreFromCheckpoint, Start, Stop, Inspect, HealthCheck. Wire mode detection in cmd/server/main.go. Target: 50-200ms restore from checkpoint.

title: Implement Caddy Route Manager
description:
Implement internal/proxy/caddy.go:
- HTTP client for Caddy admin API (localhost:2019)
- POST routes dynamically via /config/apps/http/servers/srv0/routes
- DELETE routes when instances expire
- Write comprehensive tests
close_reason: Implemented CaddyRouteManager with Add/Remove/Get/List routes. Unit and mock tests passing.

title: Implement Valkey Repository
description:
Implement internal/store/valkey.go:
- Connect to Valkey using github.com/valkey-io/valkey-go
- Implement all Repository interface methods
- Use LPUSH/LPOP for atomic pool operations
- Enable keyspace notifications for TTL expiry
- Write comprehensive tests
close_reason: Implemented ValkeyRepository with all 17 interface methods, comprehensive tests added

title: Implement Real Prometheus Metrics
description: Integrate github.com/prometheus/client_golang. Track: pool size, acquisition latency, container startup time, route operations. Fix placeholder in internal/api/handler.go.

title: Implement Pool Manager
description:
Implement internal/pool/impl.go:
- Implement Manager interface
- Wire up Repository, Runtime, RouteManager
- Background replenishment loop with watermark triggers
- Stats reporting
- Write comprehensive tests
close_reason: Implemented PoolManager with Acquire, Release, Stats, Replenisher. All tests passing.

title: Production Validation Fixes
description: Add TTL to rate limit counters in internal/store/valkey.go. Validate checkpoint path exists when Podman mode enabled. Switch instance IDs from timestamp to UUID.

title: Wire Up API Handlers
description:
Replace 501 stubs with real implementations:
- Inject Pool Manager into Handler
- Implement acquireDemo (POST /demos)
- Implement getDemo (GET /demos/:id)
- Implement releaseDemo (DELETE /demos/:id)
- Implement extendDemo (POST /demos/:id/extend)
- Implement listDemos (GET /demos)
- Implement getStats (GET /stats)
- Write integration tests
close_reason: All endpoints implemented: acquire, get, extend, release, status, stats, metrics. Tests passing.

title: End-to-End Integration Tests
description: Create tests/integration/e2e_test.go. Test full flow: acquire → health check → extend TTL → release. Use real containers (Docker first, then Podman). Skip pattern: require E2E_TEST=1 env var.

title: Implement Docker Runtime
description:
Implement internal/container/docker.go:
- Implement Runtime interface using Docker SDK
- This is the dev/fallback mode (no CRIU)
- Use github.com/docker/docker/client
- Start, Stop, inspect container operations
- Write comprehensive tests
close_reason: Implemented DockerRuntime with Start, Stop, Inspect, HealthCheck. Unit tests passing.

title: Fix Docker network configuration for dev mode
description:
When running 'make dev', containers fail to start with:
'network demo-net not found'

Root cause: Default network in config.go is 'demo-net' but Docker Compose creates it as 'deployments_demo-net'.

Fix: Change default network to empty string in internal/config/config.go line ~99:
- Network: getEnv("CONTAINER_NETWORK", "demo-net"),
+ Network: getEnv("CONTAINER_NETWORK", ""),

Empty network = use Docker's default bridge, which works for dev mode.
close_reason: Changed default network from 'demo-net' to empty string. Empty network uses Docker's default bridge, avoiding mismatch with Docker Compose naming.

title: Add Structured Logging
description: Create pkg/logging/logger.go wrapper. Replace all log.Printf calls with leveled structured logging. Add levels: debug, info, warn, error. Use slog (Go 1.21+) or zerolog.
